message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $70 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $82. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit below your last offer. I'm willing to meet you at $78. Can we meet in the middle?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $84. It's the highest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I've decided to go with my original target price. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. Can we finalize the deal at this price?
